gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 哎喲，我剛才摔了一跤。

gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Wow, this dish is really spicy.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āiyō, zhège cài zhēn là.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 哎喲，你真是個好人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Ah, you're really a good person.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āiyō, nǐ zhēn shìge hǎo rén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 哎喲，怎麼這麼晚了？
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Oh no, why is it so late?
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āiyō, zěnme zhème wǎn le?

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 哎喲，這個包包好看又實用。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Wow, this bag is both beautiful and practical.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Āiyō, zhège bāo bāo hǎo kàn yòu shíyòng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他堅持挨著我走。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He insists on walking beside me.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā jiānchí āi zhe wǒ zǒu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他站在我旁邊挨著我。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He stands next to me, close to me.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zhàn zài wǒ pángbiān āi zhe wǒ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他不想挨那麼近的人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He doesn't want to be close to people.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā bùxiǎng āi nàme jìn de rén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他受了一點傷，但還能挨受。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He got a little hurt, but can still bear it.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā shòu le yīdiǎn shāng, dàn hái néng āi shòu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 為了成功，他願意挨一切困難。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: For success, he is willing to endure all difficulties.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wèi le chénggōng, tā yuànyì āi yīqiè kùnnan.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 現代社會癌症的發病率越來越高。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The incidence of cancer in modern society is becoming increasingly high.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Xiàndài shèhuì áizhèng de fābìng lǜ yuè lái yuè gāo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 依照醫生的建議，他要接受抗癌治療。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: According to the doctor's recommendation, he needs to undergo cancer treatment.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Yīzhào yīshēng de jiànyì, tā yào jiēshòu kàng ái zhìliáo.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 癌症的治療需要經常定期檢查。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Cancer treatment requires regular check-ups.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Áizhèng de zhìliáo xūyào jīngcháng dìngqī jiǎnchá.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她的外婆得了乳腺癌，經過手術和化療後現在已經康復了。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Her grandmother had breast cancer, but after surgery and chemotherapy, she has now recovered.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de wàipó déle rǔxiàn ái, jīngguò shǒushù hé huàliáo hòu xiànzài yǐjīng kāngfù le.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他們正在進行有關癌症的研究。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: They are conducting research on cancer.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen zhèngzài jìnxíng yǒuguān áizhèng de yánjiū.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他買了一部新手機，愛不釋手。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He bought a new mobile phone and can't put it down.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā mǎi le yī bù xīn shǒujī, àibùshìshǒu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡音樂，每天都愛不釋手地聽。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I love music and listen to it every day without getting tired of it.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān yīnyuè, měitiān dōu àibùshìshǒu de tīng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她對閱讀感興趣，看到好書就愛不釋手。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She is interested in reading and can't let go of a good book when she sees one.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā duì yuèdú gǎn xìngqù, kàndào hǎoshū jiù àibùshìshǒu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這部電影太精彩了，讓我愛不釋手。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This movie is so wonderful that I can't stop watching it.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè bù diànyǐng tài jīngcǎi le, ràng wǒ àibùshìshǒu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他對攝影有熱情，每次拍照都愛不釋手。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He is passionate about photography and can't help but take pictures every time.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā duì shèyǐng yǒu rèqíng, měi cì pāizhào dōu àibùshìshǒu.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這位藝術家深受觀眾愛戴。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This artist is deeply loved and respected by the audience.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè wèi yìshùjiā shēnshòu guānzhòng àidài.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 在我們的文化中，長輩是值得愛戴的。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: In our culture, the elders are deserving of love and respect.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zài wǒmen de wénhuà zhōng, zhǎngbèi shì zhídé àidài de.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這位領導人受到全國人民的愛戴。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This leader is loved and respected by the whole nation.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè wèi lǐngdǎo rén shòudào quánguó rénmín de àidài.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這位老師以其幽默風趣贏得學生的愛戴。

gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè wèi lǎoshī yǐ qí yōumò fēngqù yíngdé xuéshēng de àidài.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這本書作者以其深思熟慮的觀點贏得了讀者的愛戴。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The author of this book has won the love and respect of the readers with his thoughtful perspective.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè běn shū zuòzhě yǐ qí shēnsīshúlǜ de guāndiǎn yíngdéle dúzhě de àidài.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他们的关系很曖昧。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Their relationship is very ambiguous.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen de guānxi hěn àimèi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她的回答让我感到曖昧。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Her answer made me feel ambiguous.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de huídá ràng wǒ gǎndào àimèi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他的言行曖昧，让人难以捉摸。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: His words and actions are ambiguous, making it difficult to figure him out.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de yánxíng àimèi, ràng rén nányǐ zhuōmō.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她喜欢和他保持曖昧的关系。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She likes to maintain an ambiguous relationship with him.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā xǐhuan hé tā bǎochí àimèi de guānxi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 这个问题没有一个明确的答案，而是充满了曖昧。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: There is no definite answer to this question, but it is filled with ambiguity.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège wèntí méiyǒu yīgè míngquè de dáàn, érshì chōngmǎnle àimèi.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 老師教我們努力學習，將來可以安居樂業。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The teacher teaches us to study hard so that we can have a peaceful and fulfilling life in the future.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Lǎoshī jiāo wǒmen nǔlì xuéxí, jiānglái kěyǐ ānjūlèyè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這座城市的人們都希望能夠安居樂業。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The people in this city all hope to have a peaceful and fulfilling life.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhè zuò chéngshì de rénmen dōu xīwàng nénggòu ānjūlèyè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 財務狀況良好是實現安居樂業的重要基礎。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Having a good financial situation is an important foundation for achieving a peaceful and fulfilling life.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Cáiwù zhuàngkuàng liánghǎo shì shíxiàn ānjūlèyè de zhòngyào jīchǔ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他每天都在努力工作，為了能夠實現安居樂業。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He works hard every day in order to achieve a peaceful and fulfilling life.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā měitiān dōu zài nǔlì gōngzuò, wèile nénggòu shíxiàn ānjūlèyè.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他堅持努力奮鬥，最終成功地實現了安居樂業的夢想。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: He persisted and worked hard, eventually successfully realizing his dream of a peaceful and fulfilling life.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā jiānchí nǔlì fèndòu, zuìzhōng chénggōng de shíxiànle ānjūlèyè de mèngxiǎng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這個社區很安寧，適合居住。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: This neighborhood is very peaceful and suitable for living.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhège shèqū hěn ānníng, shìhé jūzhù.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們需要創造一個安寧的工作環境。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need to create a peaceful work environment.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào chuàngzào yīgè ānníng de gōngzuò huánjìng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她在泰山上尋找心靈的安寧。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: She is searching for spiritual tranquility on Mount Tai.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā zài tàishān shàng xúnzhǎo xīnlíng de ānníng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 這裡的美麗景色和平靜的氛圍帶來了安寧感。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The beautiful scenery and peaceful atmosphere here bring a sense of tranquility.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhèlǐ de měilì jǐngsè hé píngjìng de fēnwéi dài lái le ānníng gǎn.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我在德國的一個小村莊中找到了內心的安寧。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I found inner peace in a small village in Germany.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ zài déguó de yīgè xiǎo cūnzhuāng zhōng zhǎodào le nèixīn de ānníng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 她的臥室總是佈置得很安詳。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Her bedroom is always decorated very peacefully.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tā de wòshì zǒngshì bùzhì de hěn ānxiáng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 老人臨終時顯得非常安詳。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The old man appeared very serene at the end of his life.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Lǎorén línzhōng shí xiǎnde fēicháng ānxiáng.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 在這座寧靜的山莊裡，人們過著安詳的生活。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: In this peaceful village, people lead tranquil lives.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zài zhè zuò níngjìng de shānzhuāng lǐ, rénmen guòzhe ānxiáng de shēnghuó.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我喜歡在安詳的環境中讀書。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: I like to study in a calm environment.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān zài ānxiáng de huánjìng zhòng dúshū.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 大自然帶給我們一種安詳的感覺。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: Nature gives us a peaceful feeling.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Dàzìrán dài gěi wǒmen yī zhǒng ānxiáng de gǎnjué.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們需要安置這些無家可歸的人。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We need to provide shelter for these homeless people.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào ānzhì zhèxiē wújiākěguī de rén.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他們將老人安置在一個舒適的養老院裡。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: They placed the elderly in a comfortable nursing home.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen jiāng lǎorén ānzhì zài yīge shūshì de yǎnglǎoyuàn lǐ.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 我們找到了一間房子來安置難民。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: We found a house to accommodate the refugees.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Wǒmen zhǎodàole yī jiān fángzi lái ānzhì nànmín.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 政府正在制定計劃，以安置受災居民。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: The government is working on a plan to resettle the affected residents.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Zhèngfǔ zhèngzài zhìdìng jìhuà, yǐ ānzhì shòuzāi jūmín.

gpt-3.5-turbo.chinese: 他們將這批新來的移民安置在城市的邊緣。
gpt-3.5-turbo.english: They settled the new immigrants on the outskirts of the city.
gpt-3.5-turbo.pinyin: Tāmen jiāng zhè pī xīn lái de yímín ānzhì zài chéngshì de biānyuán.
